title: The Penguins of Madagascar Season 3 WEB-DL HDTV XviD - DiGrX
description:
A DiGrX release



The Penguins of Madagascar Season 3 WEB-DL+HDTV+DVDRip XviD DiGrX

All Episodes in XviD from WEB-DL or HDTV or DVDRip


This is a DiGrX release of The Penguins of Madagascar 3rd Season with many 
episodes from WEB-DLs & HDTVs and one episode from DVDRip. In this release 
there are some fixes like the equalization of all the episodes in Aspect Ratio 
and Dimension.

         ||
         ||
         /

Codec ID, Format: XVID, MPEG-4
Aspect ratio, Dimension: 4:3, 640x480
Audio: MP3, 2 Channels


All 3rd Season 33 episodes in XviD and Aspect ratio: 4:3.
The most episodes are WEB-DLs, the other episodes are replenished 
with the HDTV ones, you can spot them from the name.

*WEB-DL = look alike the DVDRip

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Penguins of Madagascar is a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The series 
follows the adventures of the four penguin protagonists: Skipper, Kowalski, 
Rico, and Private, who perform various paramilitary-like missions to protect 
their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems 
caused, or made worse, by King Julien XIII (a ring-tailed lemur), Maurice 
(an aye-aye), and Mort (a mouse lemur).
